name: Island Maze
description: If you’re a cube, simple island will become a puzzling maze! You’ll need your shrewdness to get out of island. You surely have some, but if you doubt it – it’s time to reveal your potential!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.20GHz or faster Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 310M (AMD or Intel equivalent) Storage: 250 MB available space
